questions_and_notes: The CF conventions defines this as the mass of unfrozen water in soil divided by the mass of the (soil + unfrozen water).  To make any practical use of this you would need to know the mass of soil in each layer.  Wouldn't it be better to keep track of the mean unfrozen water density or the actual mass of unfrozen water?
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Average Layer Fraction of Frozen Moisture
comment: Fraction of soil moisture mass in the solid phase in each user-defined soil layer (3D variable)
